branchCategory.name: VMG, Blow Gun, Standard Type
branchCategory.description: <P>Series VMG has a large effective area of 0.05in² (30mm²), without nozzle. Pressure loss is 0.725psi (0.005MPa) or less when nozzle bore size 2.5mm is used.  Piping direction is optional from the top or bottom.  Available nozzles include: male thread; high efficiency; low noise w/male thread; and extension nozzles. </P>
